Name: Oaza
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Review: Herbal and bittersweet. Not for everyone.
History: A popular drink in the Czech Republic where Becerovka, a herbal liquor, is the national drink.
Nutrition: One serving of Oaza contains 168 calories
